EmailTemplate.name: Reaching Communities - Spring 2016 call for Vols
EmailTemplate.subject: Youth Board Session Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
Missed out on Action Day? Do you want to get more involved in your community?
We have a really great Easter Holiday volunteering opportunity on Wednesday 6th and Saturday 9th April 2016.
A group of NCS graduates taking part in the Reaching Communities programme have designed a great event raising awareness on the topics of Discrimination, Sexual Health and Mental Health. On Wednesday 6th April from 17:45 - 20:00 we will be finalising plans and buying and designing resources for our big event on Saturday 9th April from 14:00 - 17:00 at Redbridge Library.
We would love for you to get involved and help out as there will be loads to do on Wednesday and on the event day including:
· Helping plan and create resources for the event · Helping set-up the event on the day · Running the different games · Helping with face painting/and other arts and crafts · And lots more
What/where/when
Finalising plans and resource creating Wednesday 6th April 17:45 - 20:00 Pastures Youth Centre (15 Davis Lane, E11 3DR)
Volunteering at the event Saturday 9th April 14:00 - 17:00 Redbridge Library (Clements Rd, Ilford IG1 1EA)
If you would like to attend all, or part of these days please email Ed (edward.mann@the-challenge.org) for some more information and to sign up
Hope to see you there!
Ed
